description: The boy slave has behaved well and therefore I give him a special prize. I tie him to a chair and as a reward I bring him a lady-slave, but he must pay a special tax for this prize, which is to have an enormous erection for a long time, and let the slave-lady satisfy all her needs. The slave lady straddles him without letting him rest for one moment, until he can hold out no longer and has an enormous orgasm.
title: The Reward
